Tagline: We provide independent, objective, and comprehensive oversight of NASA programs.
Overview: We conduct audits, reviews, and investigations of NASA programs to prevent and detect fraud, waste, abuse, and mismanagement. In addition, the OIG assists NASA in promoting economy, efficiency, and efficacy in Agency projects and programs.
Associated Members: 37 associated membersLinkedIn members who’ve listed NASA Office of Inspector General as their current workplace on their profile.
